Reserves_notes: World Mine and Refinery Production and Reserves: Reserves for Australia, China, Congo (Kinshasa), Peru, Poland, Russia, the United States, Zambia, and “Other countries” were revised based on company and Government reports.

For Australia, Joint Ore Reserves Committee-compliant or equivalent reserves were 27 million tons.
